column1: Local Foods////I really didn't expect this place to be so good. I mean
column2: how good can just a sandwich be? I got the duck confit sandwich
column3: and my girlfriend got the crunchy chicken sandwich. I really liked the kale and slaw
column4: and my girlfriend liked the housemade potato chips. If I still lived in Houston
column5: I would go here much more often for lunch.
